title: Big Queries | CodeChef
statement: WARNING: This problem has large input / output files. Use of faster I/O methods is recommended. You are given an array  A  consisting of  N  integers. You have to answer  M  queries on it. Each query belongs to one of the following three types: The first line of the input contains an integer  T  denoting the number of test cases.  T  test cases follow. The first line of each test case contains two space-separated integers  N  and  M . The second line contains  N  space-separated integers denoting  A 1 ,  A 2 , ...,  A N For next  M  lines, each line contains a query. Each query is given by three or four (please refer to the statement) space separated integers. The first integer denotes type of the query. For every type of query next two integers denote  L  and  R . For each query of type 1, next integer denote  X . For each query of type 2, next integer denote  Y . For each test case, output a single line containing the sum of answers of all the queries of type 3. Array:  [2, 4, 3, 5, 5] Sum of all answers = 5.    Fetching successful submissions Program should read from  standard input  and write to  standard output .  After you submit a solution you can see your results by clicking on the  [My Submissions]  tab on the problem page.
